Class ClientRetrievalServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.service.ClientRetrievalServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientRetrievalService

public class ClientRetrievalServiceImpl
extends Object
implements ClientRetrievalService
    Service for finding existing clients.

    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • setCacheElementProvider

        public void setCacheElementProvider(CacheElementProvider<StringIdBasedCacheKey,ClientTO> cacheElementProvider)
        Set a custom cache element provider for loading clients within findClient. The cache key is StringIdBasedCacheKey whose ID member holds the clientId.
        Parameters:
        cacheElementProvider - the element provider
